question: Which of the following statements related to lanthanoids is incorrect?
choices: Lanthanoids are silvery white soft metals
<katex>$Ce^{+4}$</katex> solutions are widely used as oxidising agents in titrimetric analysis
Colour of Lanthanoid ion in solution is due to d-d transition
explanation: The colour of lanthanoid ions in solution is generally due to f-f transitions, not d-d transitions.
